column1: Smoque BBQ////I haven't had good BBQ like this in so long. I live in Seattle and when I was home in Chicago to visit
column2: a friend suggested BBQ. My sister recommended this place. As filled up as I was being on vacation and eating heavy foods all week
column3: I went with it. So glad! I forgot how good BBQ is done. I got the half and half sandwich. The brisket was so tender
column4: my teeth didn't know when it passed through the meat from the bread. The sauce was mild but good. The place is very organized so that no matter how busy they are
column5: there's someone there to help guide you. Thanks Smoque for a great Chicago BBQ experience!
